entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
